tom moreno.description: Tom is reviewing the previous day's sales reports and inventory levels, making notes on which products are selling well and which need restocking. He is also brainstorming ways to optimize the supermarket's supply chain, considering potential investments in virtual economic platforms to enhance profitability. His energetic and slightly aggressive demeanor keeps the staff on their toes as he delegates tasks for the day (reviewing the previous day's sales reports, making notes on which products are selling well) @ the ville:supermarket:checkout counter:computer desk

mk.description: continuing his research on the AI economic system, diving deeper into coding and refining the algorithms for his decentralized financial system. He remains fully immersed in his work, exploring innovative solutions to eliminate speculative bubbles and improve the model's efficiency (conversing about MK and Carlos Gomez discussing the interplay between creativity and technology, particularly how AI can amplify human creativity and foster equitable systems, while planning a collaborative workshop to bring together poets, technologists, and economists to create an inclusive platform for underrepresented voices.) @ the ville:mk's house:classroom:house garden
